alert.note: Alert for Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:42PM CDT until March 25 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Yellow River at Babcock affecting Wood County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wisconsin River below Biron Reservoir affecting Wood County. Peshtigo River near Porterfield affecting Marinette County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Yellow River at Babcock. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flooding is confined mainly to agricultural...wooded lowland and marshes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 12.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM CDT Thursday was 12.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 4.2 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1000 AM CDT.
